Key Match Events: Josh Hart and Karl-Anthony Towns starred for the Knicks
Karl-Anthony Towns became just the third player in team history to record at least 30 points and 10 rebounds in three consecutive games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks were missing star point guard Jalen Brunson for the first time this season because of a calf issue. Back-up guard Miles McBride sat out with a tight left hamstring
Others: The Jazz had raced into an 18-8 lead before falling to a fifth straight loss (7-25)
